name: Tek Tactical - An Intense, Free-To-Play Shooter
blurb: Tek Tactical. Customize your weapons. Extensive attachment options. Carbine with Red Dot sight and Grenade Launcher? No problem.

rewards.reward: YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS!\r\nYou will get your name permanently emblazoned in the credits as an official backer which will be included in all versions of the game, everywhere! (All subsequent rewards will include this feature)

AD-FREE PASS!
You will receive an exclusive pass to play the Ad-Free version of the game! No annoying wait times, no unwanted advertising; Just our final vision of the game and unlimited enemy blasting!

(You will receive an exclusive log-in account, name, password, and or serial number in order to access the ad-free version)
50,000 GOLD!\r\nYou will get the pass to the Ad-Free version of Tek Tactical, plus 50,000 gold to start the game with! This will allow you to play more fun and challenging levels earlier!

DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK!\r\nGet the above rewards, plus the full downloadable custom soundtrack for Tek Tactical, with digital cover art, and tracklist for the game! Courtesy of Eddie at YourWorldIsOurs, and Hayden Reimer aka Konacae.

DIGITAL COMIC ACTION!\r\nGet the above rewards, plus an exclusive, digital comic exploring the world of Tek Tactical! With a $25 pledge, backers will receive their name in the credits, an invite to beta-test the game, a pass to the ad-free version of Tek Tactical, 50,000 gold, the digital soundtrack, plus the Tek Tactical digital comic! Woah!

CREATE-A-HEAD!
This is where the rewards get really interesting! Pledge $50 and you get the above rewards, plus we'll include a new Head of your choice for the main character! It can be ANYBODY, any likeness; We'll put our own spin on it and include it in the game, along with crediting you for the suggestion. How cool would it be to have Santa Claus blasting away at enemies? We can even put YOUR face in the game, as the main character if you like. 1 head per pledge of $50.

[Actually, since our estimated release will be near October or earlier, it would be a phenomenal time to create some freakishly scary head types and masks. Hockey mask, Zombie mask, all that... We're looking forward to your suggestions!]

CREATE-A-BOD!\r\nA pledge of $75 will allow anyone to create or think up new bodies for the main character for inclusion in the game. We'll most likely need a stylishly-drawn, fat, Santa Claus body to go with that Santa Claus head... Just saying. 1 body per pledge of $75.

CREATE-A-STAGE!
Get the above rewards, plus you'll get be a part of the creative process and design your very own stage! Design, draft, or sketch up a background for us to use in Tek Tactical, and it will be featured in the final release! We will take your idea (description or actual sketch) and convert it into a digital rendering of said idea. Your very own brainchild!

Very cool.... and definitely worthy of bragging rights. You'll also be included in the credits for your contribution of course.

ADVERTISING SPACE!

[limited to game sponsors and website/business owners]

Pledge $500 to become a partner and receive a direct advertising spot for your website in our loading screens that will be circulated throughout all versions of the game! (Except for the limited ad-free versions and site-locked versions. The ad-free versions will still feature your smaller sized, clickable logo alongside the loading screen artwork, however.)

All we'll need from you is your ad creative scaled to 300x250.

BRANDED, SITE-LOCKED VERSION OF TEK TACTICAL!

[limited to game sponsors, game websites, portal owners] Pledge $750 to receive a fully customized version of Tek Tactical. This version will feature all of your website's branding and logos. This version will be sitelocked to your domain for all of your website visitors to enjoy. Build or maintain your brand with our quality game, Tek Tactical.

(You will receive your custom copy after the primary sponsor's exclusivity period ends)

API INTEGRATION! [limited to game sponsors, game websites, portal owners] Pledge $1200 to receive a fully customized version of Tek Tactical with your API integrated. This version will feature all of your website's branding and logos. It's everything that the above pledge is, but we'll implement your custom API and/or achievements and scoreboards, specifically for your site. This version will be sitelocked to your domain for all of your website visitors to enjoy. Build or maintain your brand with our quality game, Tek Tactical. (You will receive your custom copy after the primary sponsor's exclusivity period ends)

PRIMARY SPONSORSHIP!

[limited to sponsors and gaming website owners]

You win! Offer us $10,000 and Tek Tactical is yours! A customized, viral version of the game will be created with all of your requested branding and logos for the world to see! The site-locked versions described above will not be live until 3 weeks after the game is released on your site, giving your website ample time to soak up the game plays! The world premiere of Tek Tactical will occur on the winning sponsor's website!

(Please note, however, although this is a primary sponsorship, TYPE12 will retain full control over the ads displayed within the game AFTER a 3-week exclusivity term on the winning sponsor's site. Ads will then be activated on all viral versions of the game, except for the sponsor's site. If this reward is not purchased, the game will be self-published by TYPE 12 Games.)
